author: Bonifacio (da Ceva), 1456-1517
title: Bonifacii de Ceva,... Excellentissimum opus de perfectione christiana, divinitus editum et excogitatum, excellentia admirabili comptissimum, ad christianissime navicule nauclerum dextimum, sanctissimum in Christo patrem modernum pontificem summum Leonem X
imprint: Prostant in officina Johannis Parvi in vico divi Jacobi sub Lilio aureo
